comment: (((Kagan))) is scared that the credibility of the SCOTUS is at risk if Kavanaugh is confirmed. I hope she has a fit and wants to resign too.
amr:
# ::snt (((Kagan))) is scared that the credibility of the SCOTUS is at risk if Kavanaugh is confirmed. I hope she has a fit and wants to resign too.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / scare-01
            :ARG0 (r / risk-01
                  :ARG1 (c / credibility
                        :poss (g / government-organization
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "SCOTUS")))
                  :condition (c2 / confirm-01
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Kavanaugh"))))
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Kagan")))
      :snt2 (h / hope-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (f / fit-05
                        :ARG1 (s2 / she))
                  :op2 (w / want-01
                        :ARG0 s2
                        :ARG1 (r2 / resign-01
                              :ARG0 s2)
                        :mod (t / too)))))

comment: There needs to be more sensitivity regarding language associated with the LGBT community.
amr:

(n / need-01
      :ARG1 (s / sensitive-03
            :ARG1 (l / language
                  :ARG1-of (a / associate-01
                        :ARG2 (c / community
                              :mod (l2 / lesbian)
                              :mod (g / gay-01))))
            :mod (m / more)))

# ::snt Do not use homophobic language
(u / use-01

      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (l / language
